title: Forums to Boards
body:
Does anyone feel that this new Board feels like a different community to the old archived forums?

I thought the people were much kewler.

But I like this Board's comment system, it keeps conversations in clumps. The only one was clunky and painful to read.

replies.body: not as fun as old forums.
Boards **is** a different community. A bunch of people left when the forums became archived and since then new people have been posting.
im newish, and i prefer the forums better but the boards has grown on me.. different forum/board different life ;)

boards still look like trash, everything reads the same.
at least they don't censor the fucking swearing like forums did.
